name: Modules.BLE.Characteristic
summary: A characteristic of a remote peripheralâ€™s service.

methods.name: equal
methods.summary: tests whether two characteristics are same or not.

properties.name: descriptors
properties.summary: A list of the Descriptor* objects that have so far been discovered in this characteristic. It is writeable if this JavaScript object represents a mutable characteristic.

properties.name: isMutable
properties.description: For android, this property will always return false.

properties.name: isNotifying
properties.summary: Whether the characteristic is currently notifying or not.

properties.name: properties
properties.summary: The properties of the characteristic as a bitfield.
properties.description: See also CHARACTERISTIC_PROPERTY_* module constants for the possible return values of this property.
